name: magically

magically adverb
(USING MAGIC)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses or seems to use magic: Clean clothes don't just magically appear.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is about a boy who magically turns into a man after making a wish. Unfortunately, things won't magically correct themselves. The legend of Santa Claus - who magically leaves presents in stockings at Christmas as children sleep - has its roots in a real man.
